item.title: Up and running with the awesome hugo
item.description: Hello World! I am kickstarting this website today. I’ve been switching themes and platforms. First I tried Jekyll, but it didn’t turn out that good for me. Then I started writing a new website from scratch and dropped it in between :P. Now, I am using hugo, seems pretty cool and easy to use until now. Let’s hope I stick around this one for a while atleast. I am using Ghostwriter theme and hope to stick with it.
